content: sitting kitty bookmark sally ives/february 2002 materials steel crochet hook size us6 1 6mm size 10 cotton round 1 chain 78 single_crochet in 6th chain from hook ch3 skip 2ch single_crochet in next to last 2 sts chain 3 single_crochet ch3 in end st work in unworked loops on opposite side skip 2 st single_crochet in next ch3 skip 2sts to beginning single_crochet slip_stitch in same loop as beginning crochet 24 ch3 loops on each side of starting chain with one extra chain 3 loop at top--this will be the head round 2 rs 2sc 2hdc 3dc 2hdc 2sc in top loop 5 double_crochet in next loop single_crochet in next 5 times slip_stitch in next single_crochet ch3 turn work so you are working on opposite side rs facing you ch3 is kept behind work slip_stitch in single_crochet single_crochet in loop 5 double_crochet in next 5 times slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet fo there will be several loops not worked into this will be the tail when you work the ch3 hold tail forward so chain is behind piece with rs facing side 1 join to 1st single_crochet of round 2 at bottom right ch1 single_crochet in same st ch1 2dc in ea of next 2 sts ch2 skip 1 st 2 double_crochet in next st 2tr in next skip single_crochet 2tr in next st 2 double_crochet in next ch2 skip 1 st 2dc in next 2hdc in next skip 1sc 2hdc in next 2 sts ch1 sk1 2hdc in next 2 double_crochet in next skip 1sc 2dc in next st 2hdc in next ch1 sk1 2hdc in next single_crochet in next skip 1sc single_crochet in next 2sc in next ch1 sk1 2sc in next st 2hdc in next st skip joining st half_double_crochet in next st slip_stitch in next st for ear ch4 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook half_double_crochet in next double_crochet in next skip 1 st slip_stitch in 3 sts repeat for other ear skip 1st slip_stitch in next second side is worked reverse of 1st side half_double_crochet in next st skip 1sc 2 half_double_crochet in next 2sc in next st then ch1 sk1 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet in following st sk1 single_crochet in next 2hdc in next ch1 sk1 2hdc in next 2dc in next skip single_crochet 2 double_crochet in next 2hdc in next ch1 sk1 2hdc in next 2 sts skip single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet in next ch2 skip 1 2 double_crochet in following st 2 treble_crochet in next skip single_crochet 2 treble_crochet in next 2dc in next ch2 sk1 2 double_crochet in each of next 2 sts ch1 single_crochet in next slip_stitch in same st fo weave in ends
